entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 6.6°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers or periods of drizzle ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then rain. Periods of freezing rain inland overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rain along parts of the coast in the morning. Fog patches. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
